scripts.build:
for dir in tags/*;do
node_modules/.bin/riot $dir public/$dir.js
done
scripts.watch:both: nodemon -w server -w tags -e html,css,js,json,tag -x 'npm run build && npm run start'
scripts.test: npm run test:riot && npm run test:server
scripts.test:riot:watch: nodemon -w test -w tags -e js,tag -x 'npm run test:riot'
scripts.test:server:watch: nodemon -w test -w server -e js -x 'npm run test:server'
